attributes.action: amend current abortion legislation to require a gentic fathers consent in an abortion also.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge the PM to amend current abortion legislation to require a gentic fathers consent also in an abortion. 

As donators of 50% of the embryo and as co-creator he should have a say in what happens to his co-created child.

He should not be compelled to stand back and watch his child or the genetic print of one to be destroyed.

We therefore again urge the prime minister to seriously consider this amendment and seek its creation.

Mutal consent is required for the creation of life so it should be for its reluctant distruction.
